model.name: marketdata
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW PersonData ( SSN string PRIMARY KEY, Name string, Nationality string, DOB string ) AS SELECT SP.SSN, SP.Name, SP.Nationality, SP.DOB FROM (EXEC file.getTextFiles('person-data.txt')) AS f, TEXTTABLE(f.file COLUMNS SSN string, Name string, Nationality string, DOB string HEADER) AS SP;
